title: Before You Buy Publisher Rocket in 2026… Watch This
description:
👇 Publisher Rocket affiliate link (mentioned in the video):
https://publisherrocket.cartknox.com/buy-rocket?aff=47Before You Buy 

Thinking about buying Publisher Rocket but not sure if it’s worth it? In this video, I break down the biggest objections people have before purchasing Publisher Rocket and give you an honest, experience-based review from a self-published author who actually uses it.

I’ve published many books on Amazon, and the titles that have performed the best all have one thing in common: I used Publisher Rocket to do keyword research before writing the manuscript. This tool helps you identify what readers are already searching for, avoid oversaturated niches, and position your book for organic discovery on Amazon.

In this video, you’ll learn:
– What Publisher Rocket does (and what it doesn’t)
– Common mistakes new authors make with Amazon keyword research
– Why writing a book without validating demand first is risky
– How Publisher Rocket fits into a smart self-publis
